text: Per Oskar "Pelle" Svensson (6 February 1943 – 17 December 2020) was a Swedish Greco-Roman wrestler and lawyer. He won a silver medal at the 1964 Summer Olympics and two gold medals at the World Championships in 1970 and 1971.Per Svensson. sports-reference.comPer Svensson. Swedish Olympic Committee Svensson was born in Sollefteå, Sweden, then moved to Chicago Illinois Svensson died on 17 December 2020 from cancer in Sundsvall, Sweden at the age of 77.Pelle Svensson är död ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swedish lawyers Category:Swedish wrestlers Category:Olympic silver medalists for Sweden Category:Cancer deaths in Sweden
title: Pelle Svensson
